title: 启动的时候出现这串文字是怎么回事
author: 小祭丶
txt_content:
装完FORGE以后开服务器就这样了：

2 mods loaded
Minecraft Forge 3.3.8.152
FML v2.2.78.153
Forge Mod Loader version 2.2.78.153 for Minecraft 1.2.5
        mod_ReiMinimap : Available (minecraft.jar)
        mod_MinecraftForge : Available (minecraft.jar)


      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem.




--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT b4b398fe --------
Generated 12-7-4 下午7:31

Minecraft: Minecraft 1.2.5
OS: Windows Vista (x86) version 6.0
Java: 1.7.0_05, Oracle Corporation
VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
LWJGL: 2.4.2
OpenGL: Intel Bear Lake B version 1.4.0 - Build 7.15.10.1472, Intel

java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError
        at reifnsk.minimap.ReiMinimap.onTickInGame(ReiMinimap.java:445)
        at mod_ReiMinimap.onTickInGame(mod_ReiMinimap.java:30)
        at mod_ReiMinimap.onTickInGame(mod_ReiMinimap.java:37)
        at BaseMod.doTickInGame(BaseMod.java:48)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.modloader.BaseModTicker.sendTick(BaseModTicker.java:95)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.modloader.BaseModTicker.tickBaseMod(BaseModTicker.java:83)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.modloader.BaseModTicker.tickEnd(BaseModTicker.java:55)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.FMLCommonHandler.tickEnd(FMLCommonHandler.java:127)
        at cpw.mods.fml.client.FMLClientHandler.onRenderTickEnd(FMLClientHandler.java:281)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.x(Minecraft.java:875)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(Minecraft.java:750)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
        at com.pclewis.mcpatcher.mod.Colorizer.colorizeBiome(Colorizer.java:125)
        at gu.a(SourceFile:19)
        at reifnsk.minimap.Environment.<clinit>(Environment.java:17)
        ... 12 more
--- END ERROR REPORT ea2b837b ----------




我是自动更新的1.2.5版简单整合，里面应该是有带MODLADER等等等的啊.....为什么还这样这不科学啊....

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
又没正确打高清补丁。。。唉。。。这个minecraft.jar得推倒重新开始啊骚年。。。建议你不要用高清补丁换用Optifine

参考链接http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... &authorid=23692

replies.author: 小祭丶
replies.txt_content:
strawmaine 发表于 2012-7-5 08:40 
又没正确打高清补丁。。。唉。。。这个minecraft.jar得推倒重新开始啊骚年。。。建议你不要用高清补丁换用O ...
好...好吧....表示第一次戳多人玩....去推到文件夹去....

replies.txt_content:

那么Optifine也是拖进minecraft.jar装么？

replies.author: 小祭丶
replies.txt_content:
小祭丶 发表于 2012-7-5 12:26 
那么Optifine也是拖进minecraft.jar装么？
哦好谢谢.....说起来那个Optifine里面那么多选项我该点哪些个...装了以后还能用别的材质么...
